entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:56 PM CST Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:56 PM CST Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:56 PM CST Friday 7 April 2023
